pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Regression Models using Nearest Neighbor Gaussian Processes // Fits Gaussian univariate Bayesian spatial regression models using Nearest Neighbor Gaussian Processes (NNGP) detailed in Datta, A., S. Banerjee, A.O. Finley, and A.E. Gelfand (2016) doi:10.1080/01621459.2015.1044091 and Finley, A.O., A. Datta, B.C. Cook, D.C. Morton, H.E. Andersen, and S. Banerjee (2017) arXiv:1702.00434v2.
